desc: Show off your coding skills to the world
long_desc: A coding contest is a competitive event where individuals or teams solve programming challenges within a specified time frame. These contests test participants' problem-solving abilities, algorithmic skills, and coding proficiency. Coding contests are popular among students, professionals, and coding enthusiasts and can be conducted online or in person.

desc: Show off your coding skills to the world
long_desc: A Code Wrap is a coding competition is an exciting event organized by a society where individuals or teams compete to solve programming challenges within a specified time frame. This competition tests participants' problem-solving abilities, algorithmic skills, and coding proficiency. The event typically includes a series of problems that vary in difficulty, requiring participants to apply their knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and programming languages to find optimal solutions. The competition fosters a spirit of innovation and creativity, encouraging participants to think critically and work efficiently under pressure. It also provides an excellent opportunity for coders to showcase their skills, learn from peers, and gain recognition for their talents. Whether you are a student, professional, or coding enthusiast, this coding competition offers a platform to challenge yourself, improve your coding abilities, and connect with a community of like-minded individuals. Join us for a thrilling experience that combines learning, competition, and camaraderie.

desc: Join and enter the world of programming.
long_desc: Introduction to Computer Science workshop was an immersive event organized by a passionate team dedicated to making computer science accessible to everyone. Participants were introduced to foundational concepts such as programming, algorithms, and problem-solving, along with exciting fields like app development, web development, game development, and UI/UX design.

desc: Learn about basic of git and github
long_desc: A Git and GitHub workshop is an interactive educational session designed to teach participants the fundamentals of version control using Git and the collaborative features of GitHub. This workshop covers essential topics such as initializing a Git repository, staging and committing changes, branching and merging, resolving conflicts, and using GitHub for remote repository management. Participants will learn how to collaborate on projects, contribute to open-source software, and manage their codebase efficiently. The workshop includes hands-on exercises, real-world examples, and best practices to help attendees gain practical experience and confidence in using Git and GitHub for their development projects. Whether you are a beginner or looking to enhance your version control skills, this workshop provides valuable insights and techniques to streamline your workflow and improve your coding collaboration.

desc: Meet new people and build projects
long_desc: A hackathon is an event, typically lasting between a day and a week, in which individuals or teams collaborate intensively on software projects. Hackathons are often organized around a specific theme or goal, such as developing solutions for a particular industry, creating innovative applications, or addressing societal challenges. Participants, who can range from developers and designers to entrepreneurs and students, work together to brainstorm, prototype, and present their projects within the given time frame.

A workshop is an educational session where participants engage in interactive learning through discussions, activities, and hands-on practice. Workshops are typically designed to teach specific skills, concepts, or techniques and are led by experts or facilitators in the relevant field. They are suitable for various settings, including professional development, academic environments, community education, and creative endeavors.

desc: Join to learn and discuss about coding
long_desc: A Programming Meet is an engaging event organized by us where coding enthusiasts come together to learn, discuss, and collaborate on various programming topics. This event provides a platform for participants to share knowledge, exchange ideas, and work on coding challenges in a collaborative environment. The meet includes interactive sessions led by experienced programmers, hands-on coding exercises, and group discussions on the latest trends and technologies in the programming world. Participants will have the opportunity to network with like-minded individuals, seek guidance from mentors, and enhance their problem-solving skills. Whether you are a beginner looking to learn the basics or an experienced coder aiming to refine your skills, the Programming Meet offers valuable insights and practical experience to help you grow as a programmer. Join us to explore new coding techniques, collaborate on projects, and be a part of a vibrant programming community.

A Programming Bootcamp is an intensive and immersive event organized by a society where participants dive deep into various programming topics over a short period. This bootcamp is designed to provide a comprehensive learning experience, covering fundamental concepts as well as advanced techniques. Participants will engage in hands-on coding sessions, interactive workshops, and collaborative projects, all led by experienced instructors and industry professionals. The bootcamp curriculum includes topics such as algorithms, data structures, web development, software engineering principles, and more. Through practical exercises and real-world examples, attendees will gain valuable skills and knowledge to enhance their programming proficiency. The bootcamp also offers opportunities for networking, mentorship, and peer collaboration, fostering a supportive learning environment. Whether you are a beginner looking to kickstart your programming journey or an experienced coder aiming to refine your skills, the Programming Bootcamp provides an intensive and rewarding experience to accelerate your growth as a programmer. Join us for a transformative learning adventure that combines education, practice, and community

desc: Join to learn and discuss about coding
long_desc: A Freedom Day is a celebration of coding freedom, where participants come together to explore new technologies, share knowledge, and engage in coding activities. This event is an opportunity for coding enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and network with like-minded individuals in a fun and interactive environment. The Freedom Day includes coding challenges, workshops, lightning talks, and networking sessions that cover a wide range of programming topics. Participants will have the chance to showcase their coding skills, learn from industry experts, and connect with a vibrant community of developers. Whether you are a beginner looking to learn the basics or an experienced coder seeking to expand your knowledge, the Freedom Day offers a platform to explore new coding techniques, exchange ideas, and celebrate the joy of coding. Join us for an exciting day of learning, coding, and camaraderie as we come together to celebrate the freedom of creativity and innovation in the world of programming.

desc: Join to learn and discuss about coding
long_desc: An Intern Talk is an event organized by a society where current interns and recent graduates share their experiences, insights, and advice on navigating the world of internships and early-career opportunities. This event provides a platform for interns to discuss their internship journeys, challenges faced, lessons learned, and tips for success. Attendees will hear from a diverse panel of speakers who have completed internships in various industries, companies, and roles, offering valuable perspectives and practical advice. The Intern Talk covers topics such as finding internships, preparing for interviews, adapting to new work environments, building professional relationships, and making the most of internship experiences. Participants will have the opportunity to ask questions, engage in discussions, and connect with peers who are embarking on their internship journeys. Whether you are a student seeking internship opportunities or an intern looking to enhance your skills, the Intern Talk offers valuable insights and guidance to help you navigate the internship landscape and kickstart your career. Join us for an informative and inspiring event that empowers interns to thrive in their professional development journey.
